button.name: playheadRw
button.label: Transport.Rewind
button.info: Moves the playhead back by one bar with each press.

button.name: playheadFf
button.label: Transport.Forward
button.info: Moves the playhead forward by one bar with each press.

button.name: playheadStop
button.label: Transport.Stop
button.info: Press to stop playback or recording.

dial.name: midiModWheel
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Modulation Wheel (CC1)
dial.info: Controls modulation (CC1) on MIDI channel 1.

dial.name: midiBreathController
dial.label: MIDI Controls.Breath Controller (CC2)

dial.name: midiAftertouchCh1

dial.info: Controls aftertouch (channel pressure) on MIDI Channel 1.

dial.name: horizontalZoom

dial.name: playhead
dial.label: Transport.Playhead (Bars)
dial.info:
Turn to move the playhead backwards and forwards by 1 bar at a time.
Press to return to the beginning of the project.

orbiter.name: midiPitchMod
orbiter.label: MIDI Controls.Modulation & Pitch (CC1, Ch 1)
orbiter.info:
Turn controls modulation (CC1) on MIDI channel 1.
Tilt Y controls pitch bend on MIDI channel 1.

Note: Tilt X is unassigned.

orbiter.name: midiPitchAftertouch
orbiter.label: MIDI Controls.Aftertouch & Pitch (Ch 1)
orbiter.info:
Turn controls aftertouch (channel pressure) on MIDI channel 1.
Tilt Y controls pitch bend on MIDI channel 1.

Note: Tilt X is unassigned.

orbiter.name: horizontalZoom
orbiter.label: View.Horizontal Zoom
orbiter.info:
Turn to zoom in and out of track view.

Note: Tilt is unassigned.

orbiter.name: playhead
orbiter.label: Transport.Playhead (Bars)
orbiter.info:
Turn to move the playhead backwards and forwards by 1 bar at a time.

Note: Tilt is unassigned.
